pluginstrument.type: Bendix King KRA10-Radar Altimeter with sound
pluginstrument.author: J.ZAHAR Based on original work by Filippe Bessa
pluginstrument.description:
Version 1.10 -Modified fonts to resemble the real instrument -Modified parked needle position
Radar Altimeter gauge BENDIX KING KRA-10A -------------------------------------------------------- Radar Altimeter Bezel redrawn as per the original - Compatible XPLane and FSX/P3D - Added manual setting of DH - Added alarm sound when reaching DH. - Added DH light coming in when reaching DH
